item.title: Call For Applications: The Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Program
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
The Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Program has opened its annual call for applications for the academic year 2023–2024, and the Public Affairs Division of U.S. Mission Ghana is delighted to make the announcement. A Fulbright exchange, the Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Program develops leadership skills among foreign professionals who work together to address regional...

The post Call For Applications: The Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Program appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: The Pros and Cons of Using Virtual Reality in Education
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Virtual reality (VR) is an immersive technology that creates a simulated environment that can be experienced through a VR headset. In recent years, VR has gained popularity in the education sector, with many schools and universities exploring its potential as a teaching tool. While there are several benefits of using VR in education, there are...

The post The Pros and Cons of Using Virtual Reality in Education appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: CharityZ Supports Ms Leticia Teye; Paid Tuition Fee – Edu Scholarship Program
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
As said by Stephen Grellet, I shall pass through this world but once. Any good, therefore, that I can do or any kindness I can show to any human being, let me do it now. Let me not defer it or neglect it, for I shall not pass this way again, has been one of the motivations powering one of the renowned...
